text:
Tired: AOC Instagram Live notifications

Wired: AOC Legislative action notifications https://twitter.com/danielschuman/status/1084302688421142528 QT @danielschuman @AOC A full list of your sponsored and co-sponsored bills can be found here. (And folks can set up an alert, you know, just in case). https://www.congress.gov/search?searchResultViewType=expanded&q=%7B%22congress%22%3A%22116%22%2C%22source%22%3A%22legislation%22%2C%22house-cosponsor%22%3A%22Ocasio-Cortez%2C+Alexandria+%5BD-NY%5D%22%7D

Do you understand how fundamental the black experience is to American politics? And to American history?

One race isn’t substitutable for another. It doesn’t work like that.

It’s not about “quotas.” It’s about understanding the country you’re living in. https://twitter.com/hotlinejosh/status/1084287857315991553 QT @HotlineJosh For what it’s worth, the mix of 7 embedded campaign reporters looked racially diverse (at least based on last names), with the exception of lacking an African-American. 

If there aren’t strict racial quotas for every batch of hires, does it mean a company is racist? https://twitter.com/aoc/status/1084286707476893696

The new caravan forming in Honduras is proof that what is happening at the border is a crisis. Primarily a humanitarian one. Our porous border is luring more families with children to undertake a dangerous journey. Placing children in danger & overwhelming our asylum system.
RT @MeetThePress TOMORROW: @SenTedCruz, @timkaine, @benjaminwittes and @nytmike join #MeetThePress. #IfiItsSunday #MTP http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwvVfU_X4AUvFmg.jpg
Great turnout for our first event in Manchester, NH this afternoon! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dwu14P9X4AAiyaS.jpg

Now I am tempted to change my Twitter name to: 

“Alexandria ‘looked racially diverse (at least based on last names)’ Ocasio-Cortez” https://twitter.com/hotlinejosh/status/1084287857315991553 QT @HotlineJosh For what it’s worth, the mix of 7 embedded campaign reporters looked racially diverse (at least based on last names), with the exception of lacking an African-American. 

If there aren’t strict racial quotas for every batch of hires, does it mean a company is racist? https://twitter.com/aoc/status/1084286707476893696

The #TrumpShutdown is now officially the longest government shutdown in US history. The longer this continues, the more American lives will be hurt. McConnell must bring bipartisan legislation that already passed the House to the Senate floor for a vote to reopen the government. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1084144482948431878/pu/img/PXJPXT4gHiw_Wm1a.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1084144482948431878/pu/vid/320x320/lp_uoVvj0V2LzuK4.mp4?tag=8

RT @GOP “This is now the second Schumer shutdown in a year. He forced one earlier because he wanted to see amnesty. He forced the second one because he wants to see open borders.” -@SenTedCruz http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1084110258602233858/img/iY8whXWhDpKHYsJi.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1084110258602233858/vid/320x180/OyIqeiw8UC-_U0t1.mp4?tag=9

Love always conquers hate. https://twitter.com/ACLUNJ/status/1084168999670345729 QT @ACLUNJ There was going to be a white nationalist rally in #Princeton. The hate group didn't show. 

What Princeton got was a march for anti-racism, love, unity, and the truth that black lives matter. It was beautiful.

Bigotry has no place in NJ, and their hate has no power. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dwu99J6WoAImT5P.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dwu99J6XgAAoEPH.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dwu99J9X4AA7zGe.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dwu99J6WkAImvd8.jpg

Today is Day 22 of the #TrumpShutdown—now officially the longest government shutdown in US history. McConnell must bring the bipartisan legislation that already passed the House to the Senate floor for a vote to reopen the government. This can't continue. https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/2019/01/11/mitch-mcconnell-could-end-shutdown-hes-sitting-this-one-out/

The President’s actions have been so destabilizing + destructive that the FBI had to open inquiry on whether the most powerful person in the United States is actually working for Russia.

Reminder: Trump has currently shut down the Federal government.

https://www.nytimes.com/2019/01/11/us/politics/fbi-trump-russia-inquiry.html

Today marks 1 year since Azerbaijani journalist #AfghanMukhtarli was sentenced to 6 years in prison. The government of Azerbaijan should release him immediately and respect the basic rights of its citizens. #ExpressionNOToppression http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwuSRJwX0AApiBc.jpg
@mcwm Y’all, I don’t believe he was being condescending. It was a genuine response 💜

Friday was payday for many but not for the nearly million federal workers because of the #TrumpShutdown. All they want is to get back to work earning an honest living to provide for their families. #EndTheShutdown

Human rights defender and leader of the Campesino Movement in Nicaragua Medardo Mairena was arrested, tortured, and recently convicted on bogus charges. The Ortega regime continues to attack those who advocate for freedom and democracy. #ExpressionNOToppression http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwuP3onX0AEhykE.jpg
RT @mmfa Folks  https://mm4a.org/4d6 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwqRgzkW0AEQIpc.jpg

How can the GOP expect all TSA & other workers to reliably show up without a paycheck?

Workers rely on services like childcare and transit to work in the first place. Those services don’t take IOUs.

It’s not that workers “refuse” to work w/o a paycheck. Without pay, many can’t. https://twitter.com/yasmeenkhan/status/1083956485544132609 QT @yasmeenkhan “The workers, many of them still in their T.S.A. uniforms after finishing their shifts, showed up to collect food at a makeshift pantry the foundation set up in a parking lot near the airport” https://nyti.ms/2H8eBbF?smid=nytcore-ios-share

Hello, New Hampshire! We had a terrific first organizing event at @ManchesterCC this afternoon. New Hampshire is in this fight to level the playing field for working people. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dwv3TS6XgAEaaO4.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dwv3TSzXcAEfxCD.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dwv3TSyXgAA5hAS.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dwv3TSwW0AIf8NR.jpg

This week I cosponsored bills in support of DC statehood (HR51), repeal of PAYGO, comprehensive voting reform (HR1), and a bunch of other things, so it‘s already begun.

I’m dropping my first original resolution soon 🔥 it’s like a mixtape, but with way more nerdy producers https://twitter.com/mcwm/status/1084300584700792832 QT @mcwm It’s gonna be awesome when @AOC turns twitter vitriol into legislation

This WH admin has made having a functional understanding of race in America one of the most important core competencies for a political journalist to have, yet @CBSNews hasn’t assigned a *single* black journalist to cover the 2020 election.

Unacceptable in 2019. Try again. https://twitter.com/bfmitchell/status/1083834166175846400 QT @bfmitchell It's Official: The @CBSNews 2020 Election Team has assembled! 
https://www.cbsnews.com/news/cbs-news-announces-2020-presidential-campaign-digital-journalists/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwqMy5bWkAUHSpR.jpg

After Hurricane Maria hit Puerto Rico, our government had a responsibility to commit necessary resources to save Americans’ lives, assess damage, and rebuild our communities. This Administration failed the people of Puerto Rico. 
https://twitter.com/NBCLatino/status/1083524894015582208 QT @NBCLatino As the new Congress starts the year, Democrats are picking up an unresolved fight: investigating the Trump administration's response to Hurricanes Irma and Maria in Puerto Rico. https://www.nbcnews.com/news/latino/democrats-renew-push-investigate-trump-s-hurricane-maria-response-puerto-n955856

Richard Overton, the World War II Veteran who lived to become the oldest American man at 112 years old, will be laid to rest tomorrow, Jan. 12, in his hometown of Austin. https://www.army.mil/article/215936?dmd

Call them, @ them, visit them, & ask they give workers their paychecks without the wall:

RT @sguggenheim RT EmpowerTexans "RT texasscorecard: A Conversation with Sen. Ted Cruz https://texasscorecard.com/federal/a-conversation-with-sen-ted-cruz/?utm_source=dlvr.it&utm_medium=twitter http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwpSojZVsAADRtS.jpg"

A real national emergency is the fact that people die every day in America simply because they cannot afford medical care. Everyone deserves quality, affordable health care, which is why I support Medicare for All.

While Tornillo should never have existed in the first place, this is a major victory. It’s because of you speaking up that this happened.  
https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1083864703531659265 QT @washingtonpost Trump administration removes all migrant teens from giant Tornillo tent camp https://trib.al/IxnwpUF

It is a shameful mockery of justice that a Burmese High Court upheld the conviction of @Reuters journalists Wa Lone and Kyaw Soe Oo. The U.S. and free world should continue to press Burma to release them immediately. #FreeWaLoneKyawSoeOo https://twitter.com/statedeputyspox/status/1083792881012408324 QT @StateDeputySPOX The U.S. is deeply disappointed that the Yangon High Court upheld the convictions of @Reuters journalists Wa Lone and Kyaw Soe Oo. Today’s ruling casts doubt not only on freedom of expression in #Burma, but also raises questions about Burma’s commitment to the rule of law. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dwpha87XgAExwyk.jpg

Today, the 3 wealthiest Americans own more wealth than the bottom half of our people, and income and wealth inequality is worse now than at any time since the 1920s. This is a moral outrage and bad economics. Not acceptable.

For the LORD takes delight in his people, honors the poor with victory.

Psalms 149:4

Or: maybe having powerful editorial positions awash in people from one race, class, or gender isn’t a good idea; since we get 1000% more takes on “brown lady says a curse word” than an actual white supremacist in Congress.

If you won’t look the mirror, people will do it for you. https://twitter.com/hotlinejosh/status/1084284162654306306 QT @HotlineJosh Another thing AOC has in common with Trump: media scold. https://twitter.com/aoc/status/1084283573178433541

Today our country broke the record for the longest government shutdown in U.S. history. This isn’t a record to be proud of — 800,000 federal workers do not know when their next paycheck will come. And for every paycheck missed, it gets harder to get back on track.
Today as we commemorate Haiti’s devastating 7.0 magnitude earthquake, we remember those who lost their lives and unite in prayer with the Haitian-American community.

Can I move that all of Fox News’ “Pinocchios” be renamed “Lloronas”? 😂 https://twitter.com/topropetravis/status/1083871015560757248 QT @TopRopeTravis A Fox News host just suggested that @AOC could enter the 2020 presidential race.

She will be 30 in 2020.

Has anyone at Fox News EVER read the Constitution?

Food inspectors make sure our veggies aren’t crawling with deadly bacteria. We have to get the government back up and running, and stop holding the American people hostage because of the President’s vanity project.

Today, the top 0.1% owns more wealth than the bottom 90%.  

Uncontrolled greed cannot be the driving force behind our economy.  

Our job: demand that all Americans have good paying jobs, health care, quality education, and a healthy environment.
